item.description:
If you are in Cambridge, Everett, Somerville, Boston, Chelsea, Revere or Saugus please attend this election tomorrow to choose a Republican State Committee Man for the MIDDLESEX/SUFFOLK/ESSEX district (i.e., if Galluccio is your State Senator):

WHEN: Wednesday, April 23rd. 7:00 PM
WHERE: Cambridge Rindge & Latin School, Media Cafeteria. 459 Broadway Cambridge

All Ron Paul supporters who are registered Republicans and who live in the district are encouraged to attend and do the following:

First, if allowed, sign up as a member of one of the Cambridge Republican Town and Ward committees in order to establish voting eligibility.

Second, if allowed to vote, please support the "Ronald Reagan Republican" candidate who presents himself at the meeting.

The State Committee Man will elect more delegates to the National Convention. Winning this election tomorrow night will help get more Ron Paul supporters to the National convention. PLEASE ATTEND FIRST AND FOREMOST AS REPUBLICAN PARTY SUPPORTERS WHO WANT TO JOIN THE WARD AND TOWN COMMITTEES. ONCE A MEMBER, IF ALLOWED, SUPPORT OUR CANDIDATE.

Go here http://www.wheredoivo... to check if you live in the Middlesex, Suffolk and Essex (senate) District. After entering your information scroll down to District Representatives and Senate in General Court to find your senate district.

The Middlesex, Suffolk and Essex (senate) District includes: ? Cambridge, ward 3, precinct 2, wards 6 and 7, ward 8, precincts 1 and 2, ward 9, precinct 1, ward 10, precinct 2, Everett and Somerville, ward 1, precinct 1, ward 2, precinct 1, in the county of Middlesex; Boston, ward 2, ward 21, precincts 4, 6 and 7, ward 22, precincts 1, 2 and 5, Chelsea and Revere, ward 6, in the county of Suffolk; and Saugus, precincts 2, 6 and 10, in the county of Essex."

Please attend if you are in the district.

QUESTIONS? Call joe 617 436-0320 or 857 872 1054 (c ) or email me at jureneck@comcast.net
item.why: To help get delegates elected to the Republican National Convention
item.name: URGENT! IN CAMBRIDGE! State Committee Election Tomorrow Night!
